raw_text: DIGITAL MEDIA MANAGER       Professional Overview     Talented media planner offering exceptional strengths in executing paid digital media campaigns and ensuring content is delivered to the right audience segments. Detail-oriented and highly organized with track record of exceeding clients expected key performance metrics by constantly analyzing results and implementing digital media best practices.        Skills      Google Search, Display, Mobile, Video Campaigns.   Google Analytics measurement, Report & Tracking.   Facebook Business Manager, Ads Manager & Power Editor.   Creative & Professional Copy writing.         Professional Experience     11/2015   to   Current     Digital Media Manager    Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Responsible for executing all paid media campaigns across digital platforms including Google, Facebook and Instagram.   Delivered monthly client reports analyzing the overall effectiveness of paid media campaigns.   Perform ad-hoc assignments as needed including market research and uncovering relevant data to drive campaign success.   Continuously demonstrated ability to maintain and adhere to client budget while meeting expected KPI's.          04/2015   to   10/2015     Business Manager    Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Responsible for introducing Fetch Rewards mobile application to Puerto Rico market to analyze adoption rate.   Implemented and installed first successful hardware at POS lanes in Selectos Los Prados.   Executed digital & guerilla marketing strategy to increase users and demonstrated ability to run a succesful pilot program.   Trained store employees, managers & executives on the use of mobile application.          08/2014   to   04/2015     Account Executive & Digital Media Manager    Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Handled multiple client accounts for Search in 3D including account management, digital adverstising budgets & monthly reports.   Effectively created english & spanish copy for clients social feeds including but not limited to facebook & instagram.   Demonstrated ability to work individually on assigned tasks and as a team player creating new campaign ideas & proposals.           Education     2012     Bachelor of Science  :   Finance & Entrepreneurship    Northeastern University   －   City  ,   State  ,   USA
story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a dynamic digital media professional whose journey in the digital landscape has been nothing short of remarkable. After graduating from Northeastern University in 2012 with a Bachelor's degree in Finance and Entrepreneurship, they embarked on a career that would showcase their talent for connecting brands with their ideal audiences.

Their professional story begins as an Account Executive & Digital Media Manager at a company where they juggled multiple responsibilities for Search in 3D. Here, they demonstrated their bilingual capabilities by crafting engaging content in both English and Spanish for social media platforms. Whether working solo or collaborating with team members, they consistently delivered innovative campaign ideas and proposals.

In spring 2015, an exciting opportunity arose in Puerto Rico, where they took on the role of Business Manager. Their mission? To introduce the Fetch Rewards mobile application to the Puerto Rican market. This venture proved successful as they implemented the first hardware installation at Selectos Los Prados' POS lanes. They didn't just install the technology – they became its ambassador, training everyone from store employees to executives on the application's use while executing a comprehensive marketing strategy that combined digital and guerilla tactics.

Since late 2015, they've been serving as a Digital Media Manager, where they've truly found their groove. In this role, they've become a master of digital platforms including Google, Facebook, and Instagram, orchestrating paid media campaigns that consistently exceed client expectations. Their analytical mind shines through in their monthly client reports, where they meticulously track campaign effectiveness while maintaining strict budget adherence.

Their toolkit includes expertise in Google Search, Display, Mobile, and Video campaigns, along with proficiency in analytics and tracking. They're equally at home in Facebook's Business Manager, Ads Manager, and Power Editor, complementing these technical skills with creative and professional copywriting abilities.

This is the story of a media professional who combines technical expertise with creative flair, consistently delivering results that speak for themselves in the ever-evolving digital landscape.
